0: AN ACT TO PROVIDE A HOUSING PROGRAM FOR TEACHERS
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04508
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO PROVIDE A HOUSING PROGRAM FOR TEACHERS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2016-11-23
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Dalipe (056 2016-12-14)2. Sy-Alvarado (061 2017-01-24)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-08-29
      2. Referred to the Subcommittee on 2018-08-29
          -The committee decided, upon the motion of Rep. Wilter “Sharky” Wee Palma II, to refer the bills on Housing Program for Teachers to the Subcommittee on Housing for the Low-Income and Marginalized Sector, chaired by Rep. Jose Christopher Y. Belmonte -House Bills No. 4281, 4508, 6845 and 7154
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ON 2016-11-29
